job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you an engineer who can't stand outdated code, slow releases, or obsolete practices? Do you not just create software but craft AI-powered systems that redefine engineering efficiency? If this resonates, read on.

   While many teams still cling to old coding habits-manual debugging, trial-and-error deployments, and minimal AI integration-Trilogy is rewriting the rulebook. Here, AI is at the heart of everything we do: from brainstorming features to detecting bugs, fixing defects, and optimizing performance. We don't just flirt with AI tools; we embed AI into every phase of development to cut waste, speed up delivery, and build with precision.

   In this role, you'll transform existing B2B products into cloud-native applications with AI enhancements at every stage. You'll develop and launch AI-powered features, utilizing cutting-edge retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) for automated bug detection, ensuring seamless releases without outages or disruptions. If you're seeking a role where architecture debates take precedence over shipping, this isn't it.

   If you're eager to push the boundaries of AI-driven software engineering and catapult your career into large-scale cloud-native development, apply now. But if you prefer sticking to familiar routines, manually writing test cases, or working with teams that shy away from automation, this isn't the place for you.

   What you will be doing

     * Utilizing analysis tools and RAG vector stores to pinpoint, diagnose, and rectify product defects and bugs.
     * Employing AI development agents to design, create, and deploy innovative features for cloud-native apps.
     * Partnering with a global team to deliver top-tier, enterprise-level solutions.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Repetition: We minimize tedious infrastructure tasks so you can concentrate on groundbreaking solutions.
     * Meeting Overload: We prioritize your coding expertise over endless meetings. Expect more coding, less talking., * Develop AI-driven features to enhance workflows and equip service providers with cutting-edge tools.
job_details.full_text:
C# Software Developer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Are you an engineer who can't stand outdated code, slow releases, or obsolete practices? Do you not just create software but craft AI-powered systems that redefine engineering efficiency? If this resonates, read on.

   While many teams still cling to old coding habits-manual debugging, trial-and-error deployments, and minimal AI integration-Trilogy is rewriting the rulebook. Here, AI is at the heart of everything we do: from brainstorming features to detecting bugs, fixing defects, and optimizing performance. We don't just flirt with AI tools; we embed AI into every phase of development to cut waste, speed up delivery, and build with precision.

   In this role, you'll transform existing B2B products into cloud-native applications with AI enhancements at every stage. You'll develop and launch AI-powered features, utilizing cutting-edge retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) for automated bug detection, ensuring seamless releases without outages or disruptions. If you're seeking a role where architecture debates take precedence over shipping, this isn't it.

   If you're eager to push the boundaries of AI-driven software engineering and catapult your career into large-scale cloud-native development, apply now. But if you prefer sticking to familiar routines, manually writing test cases, or working with teams that shy away from automation, this isn't the place for you.

   What you will be doing

     * Utilizing analysis tools and RAG vector stores to pinpoint, diagnose, and rectify product defects and bugs.
     * Employing AI development agents to design, create, and deploy innovative features for cloud-native apps.
     * Partnering with a global team to deliver top-tier, enterprise-level solutions.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Repetition: We minimize tedious infrastructure tasks so you can concentrate on groundbreaking solutions.
     * Meeting Overload: We prioritize your coding expertise over endless meetings. Expect more coding, less talking., * Develop AI-driven features to enhance workflows and equip service providers with cutting-edge tools.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on using AI tools to enhance traditional software development processes rather than building or fine-tuning AI models themselves. While it mentions RAG and AI agents, the core responsibilities revolve around applying these to existing software development tasks, not core AI engineering.

phrases: transform existing B2B products into cloud-native applications with AI enhancements at every stage
ensuring seamless releases without outages or disruptions
Develop AI-driven features to enhance workflows and equip service providers with cutting-edge tools
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of business needs (B2B products, enhancing workflows, equipping service providers) and how AI can be applied to meet those needs through software development.

phrases: transform existing B2B products into cloud-native applications
design, create, and deploy innovative features for cloud-native apps
Develop AI-driven features to enhance workflows
job_tasks.justification: The core of the role is software development, specifically in C#, building cloud-native applications, and integrating AI features into them. This includes design, creation, and deployment of software.

phrases: manual debugging, trial-and-error deployments, and minimal AI integration
detecting bugs, fixing defects, and optimizing performance
We embed AI into every phase of development to cut waste, speed up delivery, and build with precision
ensuring seamless releases without outages or disruptions
Utilizing analysis tools and RAG vector stores to pinpoint, diagnose, and rectify product defects and bugs
We minimize tedious infrastructure tasks so you can concentrate on groundbreaking solutions
job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes speed, precision, seamless releases, and minimizing deployment issues, which are operational concerns. While not explicitly MLOps for model deployment, it focuses on the operational aspects of software delivery enhanced by AI.

soft_skills.skill: engineer who can't stand outdated code, slow releases, or obsolete practices
If you're seeking a role where architecture debates take precedence over shipping, this isn't it.
if you prefer sticking to familiar routines, manually writing test cases, or working with teams that shy away from automation, this isn't the place for you.
Partnering with a global team to deliver top-tier, enterprise-level solutions.
We minimize tedious infrastructure tasks so you can concentrate on groundbreaking solutions.
